summary: Request to port error classes from Java SDK to TypeScript SDK, including activity failure errors with isRetryable attribute for better error handling and retry logic.
userImpact: Users lack standardized error classes and retry indicators for activities, making error handling inconsistent between SDKs.
proposedFix: Port error classes from Java SDK to TypeScript SDK with isRetryable attribute
resolutionDetails: Error classes were ported from Java SDK to TypeScript SDK with appropriate retry attributes
